scripts.start:prod: cross-env DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=servian NODE_ENV=production DEBUG=express-sequelize node ./bin/www
scripts.test-unit: MOCHA_FILE=./test-results/mocha/unit-test-results.xml cross-env NODE_ENV=unit nyc --silent mocha test/unit --reporter mocha-junit-reporter
scripts.test-coverage: cross-env NODE_ENV=unit npm run test-unit && npm run test-coverage-report
scripts.test-integration: cross-env DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=servian DB_HOSTNAME=localhost NODE_ENV=integration
scripts.epic: cross-env NODE_ENV=e2e JEST_JUNIT_OUTPUT_DIR=e2e/results JEST_JUNIT_OUTPUT_NAME=e2e-results.xml QAW_ARTIFACT_PATH=e2e/artifacts QAW_HEADLESS=true DB_USERNAME=postgres DB_PASSWORD=password DB_NAME=servian qawolf test --reporters=default --reporters=jest-junit
